A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I genuinely went into this movie looking for gripes. Beside some pacing issues and a sort of lackluster subplot\, I thought this movie was great. It did some new bold stuff with Star Wars and I thought Rian Johnson’s Kurosawa-inspired approach was really fitting for the material. All the actors were good and there were some truly jaw-dropping scenes. I’d give it like an 8.7 out of 10 if I’m getting real specific.
